General.Name: Shanghai Material Trading Co Ltd B
General.Description: Shanghai Material Trading Co., Ltd. engages in the wholesale and retail business of automobile trade, chemical and other production materials, non-ferrous metal trade, and logistics business in China and internationally. It provides metal materials, mineral products, chemical and light raw materials, and automobiles and accessories. The company also offers warehousing, information consultation, market management services, investment and management of logistics facilities, freight storage services, and technical services, as well as in the import and export of trade. In addition, it offers trade in mechanical and electrical equipment and other products; used car transactions; car rental services; material storage services; and sales of new cars and new energy vehicles, electrical accessories for new energy vehicles, auto parts, and car decorations. Further, the company provides chemical raw materials and products, rubber plastics and products, dyes, pigments, adhesives, and food additives; and wholesale of used cars, motorcycles, tractors, etc. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Material Trading Center Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Material trading Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Bailian Group Co. Ltd.
General.Address: No. 325, South Suzhou Road, Shanghai, China, 200002
